title: Do you like Back to the future?
content: Right, gimme a Pepsi free. What? Hey not too early I sleep in Sunday's, hey McFly, you're shoe's untied, don't be so gullible, McFly. Marty, you seem so nervous, is something wrong? Oh, if Paul calls me tell him I'm working at the boutique late tonight.

title: Just go in there and invite her. Children
content: I noticed you band is on the roster for dance auditions after school today. Why even bother Mcfly, you haven't got a chance, you're too much like your own man. No McFly ever amounted to anything in the history of Hill Valley. Leave her alone, you bastard. You know Marty, you look so familiar, do I know your mother? Alright, okay. Alright, there she is, George.

title: I'll get it back to you, alright?
content: whoa, whoa Doc, stuck here, I can't be stuck here, I got a life in 1985. I got a girl. Perfect, just perfect. Hey, hey, I've seen this one, I've seen this one. This is a classic, this is where Ralph dresses up as the man from space. Aw yeah, everything is great.

title: About 30 years, it's a nice round number
content: Mother, with Marty's parents out of town, don't you think he oughta spend the night, after all, Dad almost killed him with the car. Okay, real mature guys. Okay, Biff, will you pick up my books? Look, George, I'm telling you George, if you do not ask Lorraine to that dance, I'm gonna regret it for the rest of my life. It's taken me almost thirty years and my entire family fortune to realize the vision of that day, my god has it been that long. Things have certainly changed around here. I remember when this was all farmland as far as the eye could see. Old man Peabody, owned all of this. He had this crazy idea about breeding pine trees.
